sentences.en: Don’t forget to water the plants.
In 1991 the Ada plant began to wind down.
In an electric power plant the heat converts water into high-pressure steam.
sentences.cn: 在发电厂里，热能将水转化成高压蒸汽。

sentences.en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentences.cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentences.en: It would pay farmers to plough up the scrub and plant wheat.
sentences.cn: 它会出钱雇农民开垦这块低矮丛林来种植麦子。

sentences.en: Plant evergreen shrubs around the end of the month.
sentences.cn: 在月末前后种植常绿灌木。

sentences.en: Residents have helped us plant trees.
sentences.cn: 居民们帮助我们种了树。

sentences.en: Some animal and plant species cannot accommodate to the rapidly changing cond-itions.
sentences.cn: 某些种类的动植物不能适应迅速变化的环境。

sentences.en: Some soils are actually too alkaline for certain plant life.
sentences.cn: 有些土壤其实碱性过强，不利于某些植物生长。

sentences.en: The accident again raises questions about the safety of the plant.
sentences.cn: 这起事故再一次引发了人们对于工厂安全性的质疑。

sentences.en: The alfalfa plant is widely used as animal fodder.
sentences.cn: 苜蓿科植物广泛用作动物饲料。

sentences.en: The plant acts as a sedative in treating neuralgia.
sentences.cn: 这种植物被用作治疗神经痛时的镇静药。

sentences.en: The plant has an unpleasant odour and an acrid taste.
sentences.cn: 这种植物闻着刺鼻，吃着辣口。

sentences.en: The signboard outside the factory read "baby milk plant".
sentences.cn: 工厂外的招牌上写着“婴儿乳品厂”。

sentences.en: We’ve planted tomatoes and carrots in the garden.
sentences.cn: 我们在菜园里种了番茄和胡萝卜。

sentences.en: When the soil is dry, more moisture is lost from the plant.
sentences.cn: 土壤干燥时，植物会流失更多的水分。

sentences.en: Workers at the plant build the F-16 jet fighter.
sentences.cn: 这个工厂的工人建造F-16喷气式战斗机。

sentences.en: You would have to dig up the plant yourself.
sentences.cn: 你得自己把那株植物挖出来。

words.tran_cn: 适用于种植园或热带、亚热带国家的
种植机，[农机] 播种机；种植者；种植园主；耕作者；殖民者
[工经]工厂，车间；[植]植物；设备；庄稼

phrases.phrase: have (或 keep) one's feet firmly planted on the ground

phrases.tran_cn: n. 炼油厂；石油加工厂

trans.tran_cn: 植物，草木，设备，工厂，庄稼
trans.tran_en: a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
a living thing that has leaves and roots and grows in earth, especially one that is smaller than a tree
to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow

trans.tran_cn: 种植，安，插，建设，布置，移民于
trans.tran_en: to put plants or seeds in the ground to grow
